scripts.presetup:linux: cp package.json.bak package.json && rm package.json.bak && rm -rf .git/
scripts.presetup:gitbash: cp package.json.bak package.json && rm package.json.bak && rm -rf .git/
scripts.presetup:win: copy package.json.bak package.json && del package.json.bak && del /Q /S .git/
scripts.setup:linux: git init && git add -A && git commit -m "Initial commit" && cd public && git init
scripts.setup:gitbash: git init && git add -A && git commit -m "Initial commit" && cd public && git init
scripts.setup:win: git init && git add -A && git commit -m "Initial commit" && cd public && git init
scripts.postsetup:linux: git remote add origin $npm_package_config_repo && git push -u origin master && git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
scripts.postsetup:gitbash: git remote add origin %npm_package_config_repo% && git push -u origin master && git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
scripts.postsetup:win: git remote add origin %npm_package_config_repo% && git push -u origin master && git subtree push --prefix public origin gh-pages
